author: DILG Philippines
content: BE INFORMED | An infographic is being widely shared on social media claiming that the DILG has imposed a 14-day quarantine on travelers arriving from 20+ countries affected by the novel Coronavirus. We would like to clarify that the said infographic was not issued by this Department and that our policy  as of today  is that the strict implementation of the 14-day quarantine provided in DILG Memo Circular 2020-023 (Amended Guide to Action against the 2019 Novel Coronavirus) refer only to travelers from China  Hong Kong and Macau. All other travelers from other nCoV-affected countries may undergo voluntary quarantine. We wish to advise the public to only follow official announcements that are posted in the DILG website (www.dilg.gov.ph) and official DILG social media accounts (DILG Philippines). Please be guided accordingly. Thank you.

justify: explanation the photo has been circulating since 2018
label: False
title: hong kong police are misappropriating face masks for personal use
author: 香港警察 Hong Kong Police
content:
【 誣衊警務人員私吞口罩 】 近日，有人在社交媒體上載照片，誣衊警務人員從警署取得政府製造的口罩私用，引起網民非議。 經查證後，相關照片早於2018年已經上載互聯網。在全港各界同心抗疫的重要關頭，大家理應攜手合作，可惜別有用心的人再次以假消息針對及攻擊警隊，煽動仇警情緒，意圖分化社會！ 警方強調，各政府部門均按職能需要獲分發口罩。目前警隊為前線人員提供的保護裝備，如口罩及保護衣等，僅可應付日常工作需要，警隊並無囤積存貨。警隊會適當調派和善用有限資源，以確保向市民提供的緊急服務不受影響。 Recently  some people have uploaded photos of Government-produced face masks onto social media and accused Police officers of misappropriating these from police stations for personal use  which led to a public outcry. Upon verification  the photos concerned were actually circulated online back in 2018. As the entire society is fighting hard together against the epidemic  it is regrettable that ill-intentioned people once again disseminated bogus information to discredit the Force  incite hatred towards Police officers and create divisive views in the society. The Police stress that each Government department is supplied with its share of face masks in accordance to its functions. In fact  the current amount of protective gears such as face masks and protective clothing given to front-line Police officers can barely meet their daily operational needs  and the Force has not hoarded any internal resources. The Police has been frugal and prudent in utilizing their finite supplies  and will ensure that emergency services provided to citizens remain unaffected under existing circumstances. 市民報料，大陸鄉音女兜售政府CSI口罩，南昌站對出，開價$180一盒
政府逾億口罩送咗上大陸，啲人仲要拎番香港賣
香港政府無拉過一個人，點解可以仆街到咁？🤬🤬

justify: explanation covid19 is a family of viruses
label: False
title: the dettol disinfectant label says covid19 was tested
author: Dettol UK
content:
31st January 2020 – Slough  UK – RB has become aware of speculation about Dettol products and the novel 2019-nCoV coronavirus. As this is an emerging outbreak RB  like all manufacturers  doesn't yet have access to the new virus (2019-nCoV) for testing and  as a result  are not yet in a position to confirm levels of effectiveness against the new strain. Our products have been tested against other coronaviruses (such as MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV) and have been found to kill those. Although 2019-nCoV is a new strain  this virus is very similar to other coronaviruses. We continue to work with our partners to ensure that we have the latest understanding of the virus  route of transmission and will test our product range once health authorities make the strain available.
As a global leader in health and hygiene  we continue to play our part in combating and containing the outbreak of the virus. To this end  we have donated £5.5 million in cash and products to assist in the mobilisation of medical staff to treat those affected and provide soap and hand sanitisers to hospitals in Wuhan to help contain the further spread of the virus. It is vital the accurate  evidenced-based information is conveyed to the public so they are properly informed about the importance of good hygiene at all times  but particularly during outbreaks.

author: Marcella Piper-Terry
content:
From the brilliance of Dr. James Lyons-Weiler:

"The available evidence most strongly supports that the 2019-NCoV virus is a vaccine strain of coronavirus either accidentally released from a laboratory accident  perhaps a laboratory researcher becoming infected with the virus while conducting animal experiments  or the Chinese were performing clinical studies of a Coronavirus vaccine in humans.

"Dr. Dale Brown brought to my attention the studies that have reported serious immunopathology in animals – rats  ferrets  and monkeys – in which animals vaccinated against coronoviruses tended to have extremely high rates of respiratory failure upon subsequent exposure in the study when challenged with the wild-type coronavirus."

"If the Chinese government has been conducting human trials against SARS. MERS  or other coronviruses using recombined viruses  they may have made their citizens far more susceptible to acute respiratory distress syndrome upon infection with 2019-nCoV coronavirus.

"The implications are clear: if China sensitized their population via a SARS vaccine  and this escaped from a lab  the rest of world has a serious humanitarian urgency to help China  but may not expect as serious an epidemic as might otherwise be expected.

"In the worst-case scenario  if the vaccination strain is more highly contagious and lethal  2019-nCoV could become the worst example of vaccine-derived contagious disease in human history. With an uncharacteristic aysmptomatic prodromal period of 5-7 days  individuals returning from China to other countries must be forthright and cooperative in their now-prescribed 2-week quarantine."

title: the novel coronavirus is not a new virus
author: Living Whole
content: CORONAVIRUS is not a new virus. It has been around for at least two decades and is transmitted from animals to humans and then from humans to humans. It is said to have originated from eating cats  bats  and camels (depending on the strain). 2019-nCoV is a supposedly new strain of the coronavirus that surfaced in mid-December 2019 from a seafood market in China. Now follow with me: In 2004  the CDC filed a patent on a newly isolated coronavirus known as SARS-CoV. It expired on January 24  2020 -- pure coincidence given the timing of this media outbreak I'm sure. In 2015  the Pirbright Institute filed a patent for a live attenuated coronavirus to be used in the production of vaccines. The Pirbright Institute is funded by the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation and recently received $5.5 million dollars to do what they do. They were "coincidentally chosen" to create the vaccine behind this current outbreak. They will be partnering with Inovio Pharmaceuticals  Inc. (funded by the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation) to create said vaccine. This company brought you the zika quackxine in a record-breaking 7 months (run ... just ... run). Inovio Pharmaceuticals will be partnering with Wistar (funded by Bill and Melinda Gates)  GeneOne (funded by Bill and Melinda Gates and sponsored by the US FDA) and Twist Biosciences (funded by the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation). If the Wistar Institute sounds familiar  it should. This is the company that produced the WI-38 cell line derived from the "too many to count" aborted fetuses in the vaccines injected into your children. In October of 2019  the John Hopkins Bloomberg School of Health (Center for Health Security) held "Event 201 " which simulated an outbreak of a theoretical coronavirus that ironically  looks exactly like what's playing out right now. It ultimately becomes a childhood disease for which we need to vaccinate against. Guess who it was funded by? The Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation. You really can't make this stuff up. Sources: https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/inovio-selected-by-cepi-to-develop-vaccine-against-new-coronavirus-300992131.html https://animalpharm.agribusinessintelligence.informa.com/AP016529/Pirbright-bags-55m-from-Gates-Foundation-to-establish-livestock-antibody-hub?fbclid=IwAR3sHqYmd2fGlAEMUgi7-pc23-kASPRApAuiGmKKjaWz1eEkiFgH1WRsHX4 http://www.genels.com/en/sub0201.php https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/summary.html https://www.ijidonline.com/article/S1201-9712(20)30011-4/fulltext https://www.businessinsider.com/microsoft-buys-dna-from-twist-bioscience-2016-4/lightbox?r=AU&IR=T&jwsource=cl http://www.centerforhealthsecurity.org/event201/scenario.html?fbclid=IwAR1jYT9U1xU0kQBrkC_afsVMlMl3bsfAhzQeqFuyXJGzUsmjAgFc4S2IW9g https://patents.google.com/patent/US7220852 https://patents.google.com/patent/EP3172319B1/en

author: Archeparchy of Philadelphia - Філадельфійська Архиєпархія УГКЦ
content:
Very Rev. Archpriest John M. Fields  our Communications and Religious Education Director  passed away. Please say a prayer for the blessed repose of his soul. -------------- I regret to inform our bishops  priests  religious  and faithful that Father John Fields has passed away in his home. The cause of death is yet to be determined. Father John was born in 1950 and this year in February celebrated his 70th birthday. Among the numerous services that Father John rendered to the Church was ministry as long-time pastor and  in recent years  Religious Education and Communications Director of our Archeparchy. Father John had many assignments in different parishes and various capacities throughout our Archeparchy. A lawyer by first profession  Father John had a bright and inquisitive mind. He was a builder of churches  an avid conversationalist  a communicator. Animated  quick-witted  and with an incisive sense of humor Father John kept us alert. He loved to share news and was adept at doing so. Father John was an ardent American patriot and a proud carrier of the legacy of his Pennsylvania coal mining homeland. There is nothing that he loved more than sharing stories of the people  parishes  and past of our Anthracite region. He remained hopeful about the future  that of the Church  the country  and his own ability to make a contribution. In our last conversation before Thanksgiving Father John was in good spirits and seemingly improving in his health. I express my heartfelt condolences to Father John's family and friends. As Father John professed and preached  our hope is in the Lord and His Resurrection. At this time the funeral arrangements have not been finalized. Let us remember him in our grateful prayers. May his memory be eternal.
Вічная пам'ять!
+Borys

justify: explanation there is no evidence that the cause of death was the vaccine
label: Misleading
title: a doctor died in miami after being vaccineted
author: Heidi Neckelmann
content:
The love of my life  my husband Gregory Michael MD
an Obstetrician that had his office in Mount Sinai Medical Center in Miami Beach Died the day before yesterday due to a strong reaction to the COVID vaccine.
He was a very healthy 56 year old  loved by everyone in the community delivered hundreds of healthy babies and worked tireless through the pandemic.
He was vaccinated with the Pfizer vaccine at MSMC on December 18  3 days later he saw a strong set of petechiae on his feet and hands which made him seek attention at the emergency room at MSMC. The CBC that was done at his arrival showed his platelet count to be 0 (A normal platelet count ranges from 150 000 to 450 000 platelets per microliter of blood.) he was admitted in the ICU with a diagnosis of acute ITP caused by a reaction to the COVID vaccine. A team of expert doctors tried for 2 weeks to raise his platelet count to no avail. Experts from all over the country were involved in his care. No matter what they did  the platelets count refused to go up. He was conscious and energetic through the whole process but 2 days before a last resort surgery  he got a hemorrhagic stroke caused by the lack of platelets that took his life in a matter of minutes.
He was a pro vaccine advocate that is why he got it himself.
I believe that people should be aware that side effects can happened  that it is not good for everyone and in this case destroyed a beautiful life  a perfect family  and has affected so many people in the community
Do not let his death be in vain please save more lives by making this information news.

justify: explanation the risks of death from covid19 are not comparable to the risks of minor side effects from vaccines against it
label: MISLEADING
title: the risk of death from covid19 is lower than the risk of side effects from the vaccine
author: Gamzatoff Valeriy
content:
Смотрите:
1. у нас есть якобы опасный вирус с изначально заявленной смертностью 3..4% а по факту менее 1% а если строго - то 0.1% реальной смертности - как от обычного ОРЗ каждый обычный год.
2. У нас есть вакцины и уже полным ходом вакцинация. Так вот текущие серьёзные побочки по оф данным - 3%. Это только сходу выявленные а не долгосрочные. К примеру влияние на генетику и на функции воспроизводста - ну импотенция  или выкидыши или психопатологии в покалениях - о таких побочках мы узнаем через годы  если вообще узнаем. Выбирайте - 0.1% смертность или 3% побочек уже в первые дни после введения вакцины. Официальнаяя текущая статистика от CDC ниже

justify: explanation the fda will monitor the side effects of covid19 vaccination  including death
label: MISLEADING
title: among the side effects of vaccination against covid19 the fda calls death
author: Наталия Александрова
content:
Вакцина против COVID-19 - бомба: документы FDA раскрывают СМЕРТЬ + 21 серьезное состояние как возможные неблагоприятные последствия.
Публичное обсуждение и документы показывают  что FDA знает  что вакцины от COVID-19  выпущенные в срочном порядке  могут вызывать широкий спектр опасных для жизни побочных эффектов  включая смерть.

Если общественность не осведомлена об их реальных последствиях и не будет предоставлена возможность выбора  их широко распространенное принудительное продвижение как «безопасное  эффективное» и «необходимое» нарушает медицинский этический принцип информированного согласия.

Действуйте прямо сейчас через Stand for Health Freedom  чтобы отстоять свои права!

Заседание консультативного комитета Управления по санитарному надзору за качеством пищевых продуктов и медикаментов США под названием « Вакцины и родственные биологические продукты »  представленное онлайн 22 октября 2020 года  включало презентацию в формате PowerPoint из 27 слайдов  сделанную Стивом Андерсоном  доктором философии  директором MPP  Управление биостатистики и эпидемиологии  Центр Оценка и исследование биологических препаратов (CBER). Слайд 16 его презентации включал «ПРОЕКТ рабочего списка возможных побочных эффектов»  связанных с неизбежным развертыванием вакцины против COVID-19  подлежащих надзору за безопасностью FDA  показывая  что смерть  а также 21 другое состояние (большинство из которых  возможно  связаны с жизнью) -угрожающий)  перечислены как возможные неблагоприятные исходы вакцины против CфVID-19888.

Последствия этой презентации очень тревожны. Персонал FDA четко осведомлен о возможных летальных побочных эффектах вакцин против CфVID-19888 и заранее готовится следить за такими неблагоприятными последствиями посредством «постмаркетингового исследования». Такой подход нарушает принцип предосторожности  который требует  чтобы медицинское вмешательство было доказано  что оно безопасно  прежде чем оно будет выпущено на рынок. Если известно  что продукт может причинить вред  и особенно смерть  заранее  и все еще выпускается без полной информированности общественности об этих рисках  это представляет собой вопиющее нарушение медицинских этических принципов  установленных Нюрнбергским кодексом с целью предотвращения Нарушение прав человека.

ДВА НЕМЕДЛЕННЫХ ПРИЗНАКА К ДЕЙСТВИЯМ
1) СЕЙЧАС настало время встать на защиту ваших основных прав на здоровье человека и потребовать от ваших законодателей и избранных должностных лиц  чтобы CфVID-19888 (и все вакцины) были добровольными  а не обязательными. Присоединяйтесь к нам  приняв меры на платформе цифровой адвокации Stand For Health Freedom.

ДЕЙСТВУЙТЕ СЕЙЧАС: Сообщите своему губернатору и местным законодательным органам  что вакцинация COVID-19 должна быть добровольной!

2) У консультативного комитета FDA есть два предстоящих крайних срока для публичных комментариев по вакцинам COVID-19 10 и 17 декабря. Они будут транслироваться в прямом эфире. Приходите и оставляйте комментарии!

Консультативный комитет по вакцинам и родственным биологическим продуктам Объявление о заседании от 10 декабря 2020 г.
https://www.fda.gov/advisory-comtees

content: 🔈 Results of the briefing of Deputy Minister of Health  Chief State Sanitary Doctor of Ukraine Victor Lyashko for December 10: ▪️ As of today  COVID-19 is most often registered in the age group of 50-59  which is 21 6 % of all patients. At the same time  the largest percentage of lethal cases is recorded in the age group 60-69 (31 1 % of all deceased). In total  among all lethal cases  more than 75 % fall for people over 60 years old. ▪️ As of December 10  5 schoolchildren and 8 teachers were sick in Ukraine. In particular  4 classes are on self-isolation  433 schools are on distance learning format. ▪️ Among children  COVID-19 does not register often: in the age category of 0-9  the rate is 1 8 %; 10-19 years-4 1 %. ▪️ Children's health is a priority even during the pandemic. In view of this  the sanitary regulation for general secondary education institutions was developed and approved. The document comes into force from January 1  2021 ▪️ The sanitary regulations for general secondary education institutions provide for employees of mandatory preventive examinations without which they will not be allowed to work. ▪️ Among other things  the sanitary regulations set up water supply requirements; drinking regime; temperature and lighting; supply of finished cooking products  etc. ▪️ The document identifies requirements for food and cooked meals that can be offered to children  and sets out a list of products prohibited for sale. In particular  there are a number of restrictions on salt  sugar and fat content  taking into account modern healthy eating trends and WHO recommendations. For the first time at the legislative level  the issue of organizing nutrition of children with special dietary needs was resolved. justify: explanation there is no evidence supporting the claim about secret 5g networks  and the rallies in poland were against abortion law  not the new world order
label: MISLEADING
title: 5g networks are being secretly set up around the world in poland rallies against the new world order take place
author: VoxCheck
content:
About banning abortion in Poland in 2 minutes. 🔥 Protests in Poland against abortion ban have become or not the most important international news of recent days. The country's constitutional court found abortion illegal  even if there is a violation of the fetus threatening the child's life. That is  now the only reasons for legal abortion in Poland can be confirmed the threat to mother's life and the pregnancy as a result of rape. And rallies against such a decision in Poland continue still. What was the situation with abortion in Poland before the ban ❓ In 1993  the Catholic church under the slogan ′′ do not kill ′′ prolobí yu the ban of abortion for social reasons. That's how a woman doesn't want to have children or is in a tight material situation. (https://nyti.ms/34yInQj) Since then  there have been three factors that could serve as a reason for abortion:
▪ threat to mother's life 
▪ violation of the fetus development 
▪ pregnancy due to rape. ❗ But back then  in 1993  Polish gynecologists and public figures discouraged that those women who want to have an abortion would do it themselves  underground or go to neighboring countries. Over time  these disclaimers have come true  and the terms of ′′ abortion tourism ′′ and ′′ underground abortion ′′ have become usual for Poland. !! Women's rights groups estimate that every year between 80 and 120 thousand Polish women leave the country to abortion. And it's a rocking difference when compared to last year's number of legally conducted abortions that were about a thousand (https://bbc.in/3oAjg7A). Subsequently  20 years after the preliminary ban  in 2016  Polish Sejm deputies adopted a bill banning all abortion in the country - except cases of direct threat to mother's life. This norm was supported by the church again. And he had to introduce criminal liability for all involved in abortion  meaning both a doctor and a woman who applied for the procedure. But the norm was never adopted permanently and constantly withdrawn from parliament due to protests and statements of human rights organizations. Now  to introduce a new ban on abortion  they used not the legislative branch of power  but the judiciary. Deputies - in particular from the power political force ′′ Right and Justice ′′ - appealed to the Constitutional Court. And he declared abortion unconstitutional in cases of ′′ violation of the fetus development "  that is  life threat to the future child. Court arguments - the Constitution of Poland protects the right to life of an unborn child. Polish civil society representatives comment that another abortion ban will increase ′′ abortion ′′ in neighboring countries - in case a woman has funds. Or it will contribute even more to underground abortion. In any case  the situation of women in society becomes less protective: women who intend to have an abortion but cannot go abroad often fall victim to poor medical services. ⛪ All these prohibitions occur not only against the background of very conservative views of Polish society: almost 95 % of Poles are believers and over 60 % say religion occupies an important or very important place for them in life. (https://bit.ly/3jsGetO) 🏛 Another aspect is also the ′′ judicial reform ′′ of the current government. It gives the executive branch a significant impact on the courts. The EU has already stated that such changes are questionable in system independence (https://bit.ly/35zWynA) Furthermore  newly appointed judges had political past - including two of them were parliamentarians from the law and justice party  which promoted such changes regarding abortion in Poland. (https://bit.ly/3kLQtdW)

author: Barhi  Madhya Pradesh
content:
Dr. Dipali Singh  M. B. B. S  M. D. From PMCH Patna to all of you :--- * Essential medical kit at home for Corona :-- 1. paracetamol
2. betadine gargle for mouthwash
3. Vitamin C and D
4. B Complex
5. Capsules to take steam
6. pulse oximator
7. oxygen cylinder (for emergency only)
Do 8. deep breathing exercises * 👉 Three stages of Corona :-* 1. Corona only in the nose - recovery time is half a day  it usually does not have fever and it is called asymotomatic |
What to do in this :-
Steam inhaling and take vitamin C | 2. sore throat - recovery time is 1 days |
What to do in this
Grind hot water  drink hot water  take paracetamol if fever. Vitamin C  B if serious. Take complex and antibiotics | 3. Cough in the lungs-Cough and breathlessness in 4 to 5 days.
What to do in this:
Grind hot water  drink hot water  take vitamin C  B complex  paracetamol and eat lemon with lukewarm water. Keep checking your oxygen level with oximeter. If you don't have oximeter  you will be someone. You can also call the medicine store for home delivery or call PMCH. Do deep breathing exercise. If the problem is serious  order oxygen cylinder and consult the doctor online. Stage to come to hospital:
Keep checking your oxygen levels by oximeter. If it goes to 92 (normal 98-100) and you have corona symptoms (e.g. fever  breathing etc) you need oxygen cylinder. Contact the nearest health care center immediately for this and get consultation. * Stay healthy  stay safe!*
Please take care of your family and society. Stay home and stay safe.
Dr. Dipali has started a good initiative * Corona free Bihar * through which you can get free online consultation from a corona related doctor sitting at home. Get free consultation from a doctor. * Pay attention :*
Coronavirus's pH rises from 5.5 to 8.5 So  all we have to do to eliminate the virus is consume alkaline foods more than the virus's acidity level.
As in: - did it
- Green Lemon-9.9 ph
- Yellow Lemon-8.2 ph
- Avocado-15.6 ph
- Garlic-13.2 ph
- Mango-8.7 ph
- Keenu-8.5 ph
- Pineapple-12.7 ph
- Watercolor-22.7 ph
- Oranges-9.2 ph * How will you know that you are infected with corona virus?* 1. throat dryness
2. Dry cough
4. High body temperature
5. shortness of breath
6. Lack of odor
7. lack of taste Drinking lemon with hot water eliminates the virus before it reaches the lungs | Do not keep this information to yourself. Share this with all your family and friends and everyone. You never know whose life you are saving by sharing this information. Share it and help people. So that more and more people can know. * Dr. Dipali Singh *
* MBBS  MD  PMCH  Patna *

Here's what Italy says about the statistics of coronavirus deaths: - Yet at the beginning of the so-called epidemic  only 18 of the 1000 deaths were reported on television in Italy. Only 48 people were dead from the virus. This number is 190 in total. All other people died of pathologies and their death was inevitable. content: This is to inform us all that the pH level for the corona virus varies from 5.5 to 8.5... I don't know that the statement "All we need to do" is sufficient enough I believe vigilance is the key... Do everything in your power to avoid coming in contact with this unseen enemy...This incredibly real threat has disrupted our sense of normalcy that we are used to living... I believe raising the alkalinity levels in your body is simply logical and very obtainable... As I stated before it's better to be safe than sorry & hopefully soon this nightmare will be over and the credits will run on the Syfy adventure movie we have all been trapped in but as for now do your part and I hope everyone comes out on the other side unscathed that is merely a wish... But unfortunately dreams do not always come true we have to fight for our dreams and go after them and do everything in our power to make them a reality that actually happens.

Do everything in your power to avoid coming in contact with this unseen enemy...This incredibly real threat has disrupted our sense of normalcy that we are used to living... I believe raising the alkalinity levels in your body is simply logical and very obtainable... As I stated before it's better to be safe than sorry & hopefully soon this nightmare will be over and the credits will run on the Syfy adventure movie we have all been trapped in but as for now do your part and I hope everyone comes out on the other side unscathed that is merely a wish... But unfortunately dreams do not always come true we have to fight for our dreams and go after them and do everything in our power to make them a reality that actually happens.

author: Lali Gelashvili
content:
👏👏👏👏👏👏

მიუხედავად იმისა  რომ ანგაჟირებული მედია და სოროსისტული ჯგუფები დაუღალავად მუშაობენ  იმისათვის რომ დონალდ ტრამპი გამარგინალდეს  გასულ კვირას მან შემდეგი რამ გააკეთა  (თქვენ ალბათ არ გსმენიათ ამის შესახებ  გაეცანით და მიხვდებით რატომ ხდება რამოდენიმე შტატში აურზაური და ანარქია.)

1. კორონავირუსის წინააღმდეგ დამზადებული ვაქცინების მოხმარება გახადა ნებაყოფლობითა და არა სავალდებულო და მათზე კონტროლი გადასცა სამხედროებს . (სოროსი და ბილ გეიცის სურვილი სხვაგვარი იყო).
2. შეუწყვიტა WHO– ს(მსოფლიო ჯანდაცვის ორგანიზაცია) დაფინანსება და იწყება "ჯანმოს" მუშაობის შემოწმება.
3. გააუქმეს "დემოკრატების" (ლიბერასტების) კანონპროექტი HR 6666  რომელიც ცნობილია როგორც Covid19TRACE აქტი  რომელიც იყო საფუძველი BillGates– ის მიერ შემუშავებული პროგრამა სრული კონტროლისთვის!
4. გააუქმა ბილ გეითსის პროექტი  რომელიც ცნობილია როგორც ID2020 (მოიძიეთ რესურსები ინტერნეტში საუბარია ეწ ჩიპიზაციაზე და სპეციალურ ჯანმრთელობის პასპორტებზე.
5.გახსნა საჩივრების პლატფორმა  რადგან ფეისბუქზე  Twitter- ზე და YouTube- ის ცენზუტის მიმართ დაგროვდა უამრავი საჩივარი და სამხილი. .განხილული იქნება საჩივრები. მოიხსნება.ინფორმაციის გავრცელების ბლოკირება.

6. შეაჩერა 5 G. ამერიკაში.(უარით გაისტუმრა ჰუავეის ფირმა რომელიც ძირითადად აწარმოებს 5G სამუშაოებს)

7. გახსნა შტატების საზღვრები.და ის გუბერნატორები რომლებიც ამას შეეწინააღმდეგებიან გადაეცემა სასამართლოს.
8. გადასცა თეთრ სახლს ინტერნეტ ელექტრო და რადიო სერვერების კონტროლი.
9.. იმ ქალაქებში სადაც მერები და ადგილობრივი მთავრობა ზღუდავდა ეკლესიებში სიარულს - მათი ასეთი აკრძალვა უკანონო გადაწყვეტილებად გამოაცხადა.
10.116 ქვეყანასთან ერთად მიიღო გადაწყვეტილება პასუხისმგებლობა ააღებინოს ჩინეთს covi19-ის შემუშავება-გავრცელებაში.


US PRESIDENT CANCELLED BILL GATES PROJECT KNOWN AS ID2020.

The President of United States of America  Donald Trump has recently done the following.

1. Made vaccines voluntary not mandatory. Military will check purity and distribute vaccines.

2. Defunded World Health Organisation (W.H.O) forever and wants an investigation into its operations.

3. Cancelled the Democrats HR 6666 bill  known as the Covid -19 TRACE Act that was the basis for Bill Gates's diagnosis and tracking project  which was also cancelled.

4. Cancels Bill Gates project known as ID2020.

5. Opened a complaint platform to report censorship on Facebook  Twitter and YouTube. It was overrun with complaints. They got the evidence.

6. Stopped 5G rollout nationwide.

7. Executive Order to reopen states: Governors who refuse to reopen will be sued.

8. Executve Order for White House to take over all Electrical Grids: Which will include Internet servers  Broadcasting systems  Electronic systems. (Red Flag)

9. Declares places of worship 'Essential Sevices.' Some mayors are fining people for going to church.

10. Applauded Australia and 116 countries for insisting on a China Probe into the spread of Covid-19 despite several threats from China about refusing critical exports.

justify: explanation due to its reliability and relative ease of specimen collection  the nasopharyngeal swab is considered the goldstandard procedure for collecting cells and secretions from the back of the throat for covid19 diagnostic testing in contrast  the accuracy of less invasive testing of alternative specimens  such as saliva  is still under evaluation several laboratories have developed athome kits for the collection of nasal mucus and saliva samples that are then shipped to a laboratory for analysis however  specimen collection is a key step in clinical diagnosis  and experts have raised concerns about how potential flaws in athome sample collection may impact the accuracy of these tests

title: using nasopharyngeal swabs for covid19 testing is unnecessary saliva samples from mouth swabs is an equivalent substitute
